name: plantselector-mern
description: a full stack implementation of the plantselector app

scripts.deploy: rm -rf ./plantselector-server ./plantselector-react && cd node_modules/plantselector && npm run build && mv build ../plantselector-server
rm -rf ./plantselector-server/build && cd plantselector-react && npm run build && mv build ../plantselector-server

author: Walter Muschenheim
